subject: Optimization of LA Activities Timeline for Land Acquisition under Section 3 of National Highways Act; 1956- reg.

No. 247026)} Sub: Optimization of LA Activities Timeline for Land Acquisition under Section 3 of National Highways Act, 1956- reg: NHAI acquires Land as per NH Act, 1956. As per provisions of Section 3C of the NH Act 1956, 21 Days' period (from the Date of Publication of 3-4 Notification in Newspapers) is stipulated during which the Land Owners can file their Objections. It is felt that this period is presently not being utilized optimally leading to delay in Acquisition Process & additional Financial Burden. 2 The matter has been deliberated and based upon deliberations; it has been decided to prepare indicative timelines corresponding to each LA related Activities done from the date of Submission of draft 34 till taking Possession and Mutation of Land under provisions of NH Act, 1956 to expedite the Land Acquisition Process. 3 The Activities along with their indicative timeline from the submission of draft 34 till taking Possession and Mutation of Land is tabulated as below: Sr. No. Activities Duration Optimum Completion (in Days) Time from Start (Days) Submission of Draft 3A to CALA 2 Publication of 3A Notification For Verification and Signature, Upload of 20 21 draft 3A proposal on Bhoomi Rashi for approval Publication in E-Gazette & Newspaper etc. 3 Publication of 3D Notification (Depending on Project approval of Competent Authority) Submission of draft 3D to CALA for its Verification and Signature, Uploading of draft 3D  proposal on Bhoomi Rashi for 60 (for NHO) approval, Publication in E Gazette and 90 (in case of 111 Newspaper etc: Cabinet Approval) Engagement of Agency for securing ROW for Bamboo Plantation or other Trees for securing ROW after Publication of 3D Notification.
